name: Jave and the Neural Networks
description:
Jave is a robot that works on fugger in Neural Network (AI) reserach lab he was happy, but one day the earth explode for unknow reason… and the only survivor is Jave, now he needs to find batteries to stay alive… and he found a strange box, lets try to open it!

Punch trees and pick logs then click in the logs on your inventory and craft energy you need it to live!

You can see how much energy you have in your Blue bar

Get the 7 neural fragments to see the “secret final” :3
